resources.description:
Distribution
Distribution liability: Neither the District of Columbia Government nor the Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) makes any claims as to the completeness, accuracy or content of any data contained in this application; makes any representation of any kind, including, but not limited to, warranty of the accuracy or fitness for a particular use; nor are any such warranties to be implied or inferred with respect to the information or data furnished herein. The data is subject to change as modifications and updates are complete. It is understood that the information contained in the dataset is being used at one's own risk.
Distributed by
Citywide Data Warehouse Program

441 4th St NW, Suite 930 South
Washington DC, 20001, USA

fax: (202) 727-5660
hours: Monday to Friday 8:30 am - 5:30 pm
Entity
Registered Property (OTR) / OTR
Registered Property
Attributes
otrproperty_id / OTR
Office of Tax and Revenue (OTR) system identifier
ssl / OTR
Square Suffix Lot
usecode / OTR
Property use code
usecodedescription / OTR
Description of the property use code
landarea / OTR
Land area
ownername / OTR
Owner Name
ownername2 / OTR
Owner Name (#2 if applicable)
careofownername / OTR
Name to whom the tax bill is sent
owneraddress / OTR
Tax billing address part 1
ownercitystatezip / OTR
Tax billing part 2
baselandassessment / OTR
Base year land value
baseimprovementsassessment / OTR
Base year land value
oldlandassessment / OTR
Old assessed land value
oldimprovementsassessment / OTR
Old assessed building value
oldtotalassessment / OTR
Old total value
newlandassessment / OTR
New (current) assessed land value
newimprovementsassessment / OTR
New (current) assessed building value
newtotalassessment / OTR
New (current) total value
vacantlanduse / OTR
Vacant land use flag
homesteadcode / OTR
Refers to claiming a tax deduction for individuals who live in their DC home
homesteadcodedescription / OTR
Text description of homestead codes
lastsaleprice / OTR
Most current sale price
lastsaledate / OTR
Most current sale date
currentcapassessment / OTR
Cap assessment for current year
proposedcapassessment / OTR
Cap assessment for proposed year
phaseland / OTR
Phase land
phasebuilding / OTR
Phase building
taxclasscode / OTR
Tax typecode of the property (CLASSTYPE)
taxclassdescription / OTR
Text description of tax class codes
taxrate / OTR
Tax rate
mixeduse / OTR
Mixed use indicator
coopunitcount / OTR
Number of occupied co-op units
deeddate / OTR
Deed date
lastmodifieddate / OTR
Date of last data load
siteaddress / OTR
Address of the property
lat
latitude
long
longitude
city
City
state
State
zipcode
Zip code
maraddressrepositoryid
DC Master Address Repository (MAR) identifier
capstataddresskey
CityDW program address identifier
capstatlocationkey
CityDW program location identifier
ward
District of Columbia administrative area from which councilmembers are elected
anc
Advisory Neighborhood Commission (ANC): District of Columbia administrative area
smd
Single Member District (SMD): District of Columbia administrative areas from which councilmembers are elected
roc
Metropolitan Police Regional Operational Command
district
Metropolitan Police districts
psa
Metropolitan Police Service Areas
neighborhoodcluster
Neighborhood Cluster developed by District Office of Planning, for planning purposes
hotspot2006name
Metropolitan Police crime 2006 hotspots
hotspot2005name
Metropolitan Police crime 2005 hotspots
hotspot2004name
Metropolitan Police crime 2004 hotspots
neighborhoodname
Neighborhood names used by the DC Office of Planning
Metadata
FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata / FGDC-STD-001-1998 as of 09/13/2007
Provided by

resources.name: 2012 DC Registered Property

name: 2012-dc-registered-property
notes: Registered Property. The dataset contains attributes of registered properties from the Office of Tax and Revenue (OTR), created as part of the Citywide Data Warehouse Program (CityDW) for the D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) and participating D.C. government agencies.
title: 2012 DC Registered Property
